Suite.Title: YouTube Analytics

RestConnector.Title: Channel Activity
RestConnector.HelpText: Provides statistics related to users' actions on a channel.

Field.Title: Views
Field.HelpText: The number of times that a video was viewed.

Field.Title: Likes
Field.HelpText: The number of times that users indicated that they liked a video by giving it a positive rating.

Field.Title: Dislikes
Field.HelpText: The number of times that users indicated that they disliked a video by giving it a negative rating.

Field.Title: Comments
Field.HelpText: The number of times that users commented on a video.

Field.Title: Shares
Field.HelpText: The number of times that users shared a video through the Share button

Field.Title: Est Min Watched
Field.HelpText: The number of minutes that users watched videos for the specified channel, content owner, video, or playlist.

Field.Title: Avg View Duration
Field.HelpText: The average length, in seconds, of video playbacks.

Field.Title: Subscribers Gained
Field.HelpText: The number of times that users subscribed to a channel.

Field.Title: Subscribers Lost
Field.HelpText: The number of times that users unsubscribed from a channel.

Field.Title: Videos Added to Playlists
Field.HelpText: The number of times that videos were added to any YouTube playlists.

Field.Title: Videos Removed from Playlists
Field.HelpText: The number of times that videos were removed from any YouTube playlists.
